query: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.subdomain, p.id as persona_id, p.agentName, p.layoutStyle, p.primaryColor, p.welcomeMessage, p.welcomeMessageColor, p.welcomeMessageSize, p.backgroundType, p.backgroundColor, p.backgroundImageUrl, p.profilePhotoUrl, p.tagline, p.showQuickButtons, p.buttonDisplayMode, p.chatPlaceholder, p.suggestedQuestions FROM user u LEFT JOIN persona p ON p.userId = u.id WHERE u.email = 'hkcc88@yahoo.com.hk';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user VqBKoEwKfw4feq4.6cd8cd1ff95f --database aavW9BLbZ6sZHaPEemayyD --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.subdomain, p.id as persona_id, p.agentName, p.layoutStyle, p.primaryColor, p.welcomeMessage, p.welcomeMessageColor, p.welcomeMessageSize, p.backgroundType, p.backgroundColor, p.backgroundImageUrl, p.profilePhotoUrl, p.tagline, p.showQuickButtons, p.buttonDisplayMode, p.chatPlaceholder, p.suggestedQuestions FROM user u LEFT JOIN persona p ON p.userId = u.id WHERE u.email = 'hkcc88@yahoo.com.hk';
